hiveArticle.title: Hotels in Dubai are paradise of Travellers : Part V
hiveArticle.body:
![emirates.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmdytC5ZNT925chexMifis6zTdvtwogvfEkPQFHNYnw518/emirates.jpg)

Emirates Mall is developed and owned by Majid al-Futtaim Properties, popularly known as Al-futtaim group which is one of the conglomerate business houses in Dubai. This mall opened in November 2005 and is located on Sheikh Zayed road.
![kempinski.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmYRsArSjeMQSsckvD2ojZUDdYcBdyZmE94C6inet5KaMh/kempinski.jpg)

Kempinski Hotel is one of the landmark destination which is housed in the Mall of Emirates. It was opened in the year 2006. It is well known hotel chain. 
Kempinski Hotels is Europe's oldest luxury hotel group with a history of more than 119 years.
![kempinski2.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmX2vi711f8qATXxhXbwmf7bEUhXLJFD5QrYZXqEqtk178/kempinski2.jpg)
Surrounded by multi-level shopping mall currently features more than 630 retail outlets, 7900 parking spaces, over 100 restaurants & Cafes, 80 luxury stores and 250 flagship stores. 
It houses Middle East's first Ski Resort.
